alert.note: Alert for Bradford; Central Marion; Eastern Alachua; Eastern Marion; Western Clay; Western Putnam (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Jacksonville (Northeast Florida and Southeast Georgia)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 06 at 4:01PM EDT by NWS Jacksonville
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern Bradford, southeastern Alachua, north central Marion, west central Putnam and southwestern Clay Counties through 430 PM EDT... At 401 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Hawthorne, or near Melrose, moving southeast at 10 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Interlachen, Melrose, Citra, Hawthorne, Rochelle, Melrose Landing, Cross Creek, Orange Heights, Orange Springs and Gainesville Airport. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Bradford; Central Marion; Eastern Alachua; Eastern Marion; Western Clay; Western Putnam
